text: The Lincoln Aviator is a luxury three-row middle-sized sport utility vehicle. It was first manufactured from 2003 to 2005. The Aviator is based on the Ford Explorer. For the 2020 model year, the Aviator is a five-door crossover SUV. The 2020 and beyond Aviator is made in Chicago, Illinois. ==References== Category:2000s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Aviator Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Lincoln Aviator
